trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Sentinel comes into play, its toughness is equal to 1. o0: Change Sentinel's toughness to 1 plus the power of target creature blocking or blocked by Sentinel.

o4, oc T: Put a Poison Snake token into play. Treat this token as a 1/1 artifact creature. Whenever a Poison Snake damages a player, he or she gets a poison counter. When a player has ten or more poison counters, he or she loses the game.
oc T: Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt to remove all cards in target player's graveyard from the game.
The dark opening seemed to breathe the cold, damp air of the dead earth in a steady rhythm.
Triassic Egg
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: o3, oc T: Put a hatchling counter on Triassic Egg. o0: Sacrifice Triassic Egg to take target creature from your hand or graveyard and put it directly into play as though it were just summoned. Use this ability only when there are at least two hatchling counters on Triassic Egg.
Voodoo Doll
trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put one pin counter on Voodoo Doll. If Voodoo Doll is untapped at the end of your turn, it deals X damage to you, where X is equal to the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll. If Voodoo Doll deals damage to you in this way, destroy it. o Xo X, oc T: Voodoo Doll deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is equal to the number of pin counters on Voodoo Doll.

trans-unit.resname: CHR·112 | City of Brass | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you. oc T: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

o2, oc T: Remove target creature you control from the game. Play this ability as an interrupt. o0: Sacrifice Safe Haven to return all creatures it has removed from the game directly into play under their owners' control as though they were just summoned. Use this ability during your upkeep.
oc T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool. If you control Urza's Mine, Urza's Tower, and Urza's Power Plant, add two colorless mana to your mana pool instead of one.
Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.
